title: Can the Unix Shell Be Improved? Hell Yes! (FOSDEM 24)
author: Joab Jackson
description: A look inside the world of alternative command line environments, or "opinionated prompt systems," such as Liquid Prompt and Oh-My-Posh.
cntitle: Unix Shell 能否得到改进？当然可以！（FOSDEM 24）
cndescription: 一窥另类命令行环境或“固执己见的提示系统”的世界，例如 Liquid Prompt 和 Oh-My-Posh。
